headline: Latent AI and Wind River Collaborate to Advance Edge AI for Mission-Critical Systems
summary: PRINCETON, N.J. & ALAMEDA, Calif., September 11, 2025--Latent AI, a leader in edge AI solutions, and Wind River, an Aptiv company and global leader in delivering software for the intelligent edge, today announced a strategic cooperation to accelerate edge AI maturity to bring artificial intelligence capabilities to the real-time edge platforms that power mission-critical infrastructure across industries.

content.title: Latent AI and Wind River Collaborate to Advance Edge AI for Mission-Critical Systems
content.summary: PRINCETON, N.J. & ALAMEDA, Calif., September 11, 2025--Latent AI, a leader in edge AI solutions, and Wind River, an Aptiv company and global leader in delivering software for the intelligent edge, today announced a strategic cooperation to accelerate edge AI maturity to bring artificial intelligence capabilities to the real-time edge platforms that power mission-critical infrastructure across industries.

headline: Foreign Tier 1 ADAS Suppliers in China Industry Research Report 2025 | Strengthening Local Research, Partnering with Chinese Firms, and Integrating Domestic ADAS Innovations Define Core Entry Paths
summary: Foreign Tier 1 ADAS suppliers fall behind in China's NOA market. In 2024, Aptiv held just 2.6%, and ZF 2.1% of the Chinese L2+ market. Three strategies for entering NOA include local research in China, joint ventures, and tech integration. Bosch, Continental, and ZF illustrate this adaptive approach.Dublin, Sept. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Foreign Tier 1 ADAS Suppliers Industry Research Report 2025" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.Research on Overseas Tier 1 ADA
